title: MultipleFileUploadMain Props
description:
Creates the visual upload interface, including the area to drag and drop files,
an optional upload button, and descriptive instructions.

browseButtonText.description: Visible text label for the upload button

className.description: Class to add to outer div

infoText.description: Content rendered inside the info div (React component or element)

isUploadButtonHidden.description: Flag to prevent the upload button from being rendered

titleIcon.description: Content rendered inside the title icon div (React component or element)

titleText.description: Content rendered inside the title text div (React component or element)

titleTextSeparator.description: Content rendered inside the title text separator div (React component or element)
